alert.note: Alert for Coffee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 2:24PM CDT until March 26 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 224 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Elba, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elba, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, New Brockton, Alberton, Richburg, Perry Store, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Rhoades, Ino, Turner Crossroads, Clintonville, Battens Crossroads, Shell Army Field, Goodman, New Haven, Tabernacle, Camp Alaflo Bsa and Basin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
